message: Let's split it 60-40. This is a fair start considering the inflation affects me more.

Alice, considering you face 20% inflation per round, I'm offering you $40 now, which is worth more to you than a similar amount in future rounds. This is actually fair given the inflation penalty you face - if we go to another round, your money will be worth even less.
Let's split it equally this time. Even though the money is worth less to me now, it's still a fair split. If we continue, inflation will affect me more.
